GitHub Extractor CLIUniversal CLI tool for GitHub data extraction

Extract PRs, commits, issues, branches, and releases into Markdown or JSON formats

Get Started
View on GitHub

Zero Configuration

Works out of the box with GitHub CLI - no complex setup required

Public Repository Support

Document any public GitHub repository by entering owner/repo format

Multiple Export Formats

Export data as Markdown, JSON, or both formats simultaneously

Full Repository Backup

Export all repository data with a single command

Rate Limit Aware

Built-in rate limiting and retry mechanisms for large repositories

Cross-Platform

Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux

Incremental Exports

Export only new/updated items since last run (80-95% faster)

Batch Processing

Export dozens or hundreds of repositories simultaneously

Automatic Analytics

Generate comprehensive analytics reports automatically with every export
